completeJoinGame(uint256).details: Called after password verification decryption is ready

params.gameId: The ID of the game to join

params.creatorEntropy: Encrypted random value for assignment randomness
params.hasPassword: Whether the game requires a password to join
params.name: The name of the game
params.password: Encrypted password (ignored if hasPassword is false)

returns.gameId: The ID of the created game

params.gameId: The ID of the game to finalize

returns.hasPending: Whether there's a pending join request
returns.isDecrypted: Whether the password verification is complete
returns.isRegistered: Whether the player is already registered

requestJoinGame(uint256,(uint256,uint8,u.details: For public games, joins immediately. For password games, starts async verification.

params.gameId: The ID of the game to join
params.password: Encrypted password guess (ignored for public games)
params.userEntropy: Encrypted random value for assignment randomness

params.gameId: The ID of the game to reveal

createGame(string,(uint256,uint8,uint8,b.notice: Create a new Secret Santa game

finalizeGame(uint256).notice: Finalize a game and generate encrypted assignments (creator only)

getDestination(uint256,uint256).notice: Get destination for a player index (only after reveal)

getGamesByCreator(address).notice: Get games created by an address

getGamesByPlayer(address).notice: Get games a player is participating in

getJoinStatus(uint256,address).notice: Check the join status for a player

getMyTarget(uint256).notice: Get your encrypted target index (decrypt client-side with permit)

getParticipant(uint256,uint256).notice: Get a specific participant by index

getParticipantCount(uint256).notice: Get participant count for a game

getParticipants(uint256).notice: Get all participants in a game

isRegistered(uint256,address).notice: Check if a user is registered in a game

revealGame(uint256).notice: Reveal all assignments to everyone (creator only)

userdoc.notice: SECRET SANTA - Password Protected Games with FHE  All games are stored in mappings within this single contract. Games can optionally be password protected using FHE encryption.  FLOW  CREATE GAME:   1. Creator encrypts entropy (and optionally password) client-side   2. createGame(name, entropy, password, hasPassword)  new game ID   3. Creator auto-registered, share game ID (and password) with friends JOIN GAME (2-step for password games):   1. Player encrypts entropy and password client-side   2. requestJoinGame(gameId, password, entropy)      - Public games: immediately joined      - Password games: starts async password verification   3. completeJoinGame(gameId) - only for password games after decryption ready FINALIZE:   1. Creator calls finalizeGame() when ready (3+ players)   2. LCG permutation creates encrypted assignments   3. Each player can only decrypt their own target
